sense.def:
A stream
je plitva, ozka reka.

seg.quote: He led us along the bank of the stream.

sense.def:
Stalen dotok ljudi ali predmetov lahko imenujemo
a stream
.

seg.quote: A steady stream of workers left the factory.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje, vozila ali tekočine
stream somewhere
, se v velikih množicah ali količinah v stalnem toku nekam premikajo.

seg.quote: The doors opened and the audience began to stream out.
The cars are streaming by at sixty miles an hour.
She stood in the doorway, tears streaming down her face.

sense.def:
Kadar svetloba
streams into a place
, močno sije na neki kraj.

seg.quote: The sun was streaming in through the windows.

sense.def:
V šoli je
a stream
skupina učencev enakih let in sposobnosti, ki jih poučujejo skupaj.

To stream pupils
pomeni poučevati učence v skupinah glede na njihove sposobnosti.
